channel.title: Twitter @Google AI
channel.description: Google AI is focused on bringing the benefits of AI to everyone. In conducting and applying our research, we advance the state-of-the-art in many domains. - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: Introducing VideoPoet, a large language model for zero-shot video generation that produces a range of large & smooth motions while preserving objects...
item.description: Introducing VideoPoet, a large language model for zero-shot video generation that produces a range of large & smooth motions while preserving objects‚Äô appearance over multiple seconds. Learn more and check out a range of example generated videos ‚Üí https://goo.gle/4atanoj
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Post-event traffic congestion around stadiums is a problem worldwide. Today, in partnership with the Seattle Dept. of Transportation, we demonstrate a...
item.description: Post-event traffic congestion around stadiums is a problem worldwide. Today, in partnership with the Seattle Dept. of Transportation, we demonstrate a potential simulation-based plan calibrated for the specific dynamics of the area for better traffic flow. https://goo.gle/3v7AEZv
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Join Ret. Admiral William McRaven & Google‚Äôs SVP of Research, Technology & Society, James Manyika, as they discuss the future of AI, its potential to...
item.description: Join Ret. Admiral William McRaven & Google‚Äôs SVP of Research, Technology & Society, James Manyika, as they discuss the future of AI, its potential to benefit society, & the crucial role of leadership in its responsible development. Watch the full video ‚Üí https://goo.gle/3RqDKiD
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Congrats to Di Wang & coauthors for co-winning the SODA 2024 Best Paper Award for "Deterministic Near-Linear Time Minimum Cut in Weighted Graphs", whi...
item.description: Congrats to Di Wang & coauthors for co-winning the SODA 2024 Best Paper Award for "Deterministic Near-Linear Time Minimum Cut in Weighted Graphs", which is a significant development since Karger's famous randomized algorithm for this problem. Learn more‚Üí https://goo.gle/48mXpqr
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Responsible AI is artificial intelligence built using a human-centered design approach. Learn how Google Research approaches Responsible AI, including...
item.description: Responsible AI is artificial intelligence built using a human-centered design approach. Learn how Google Research approaches Responsible AI, including how it‚Äôs built, tested, and how to release AI products responsibly. Watch the full video ‚Üí https://goo.gle/3tpDDvy
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Read all about recent advances in using ML to improve efficiency of ML workloads ‚Äî including TpuGraphs, a performance prediction dataset on large ten...
item.description: Read all about recent advances in using ML to improve efficiency of ML workloads ‚Äî including TpuGraphs, a performance prediction dataset on large tensor computational graphs, and Graph Segment Training, a novel method to scale graph neural networks ‚Üíhttps://goo.gle/3RrnQUZ
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Google Research helped develop Magic Editor, an AI-powered photo editor that allows users to easily make complex edits to photos using generative AI. ...
item.description: Google Research helped develop Magic Editor, an AI-powered photo editor that allows users to easily make complex edits to photos using generative AI. We fine-tuned models for inpainting, image transformation, super-resolution, and more. Learn more ‚Üí https://goo.gle/3t4lcfU
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Introducing StyleDrop, a model that allows a significantly higher level of stylized text-to-image synthesis by using a few style reference images that...
item.description: Introducing StyleDrop, a model that allows a significantly higher level of stylized text-to-image synthesis by using a few style reference images that describe the style for text-to-image generation, bypassing the burden of text prompt engineering. More‚Üí https://goo.gle/3v0PsZw
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Congratulations to Thomas Steinke, Milad Nasr, & Matthew Jagielski for their paper "Privacy Auditing with One (1) Training Run", which won the #NeurIP...
item.description: Congratulations to Thomas Steinke, Milad Nasr, & Matthew Jagielski for their paper "Privacy Auditing with One (1) Training Run", which won the #NeurIPS2023 Award for Best Paper! https://arxiv.org/abs/2305.08846
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Meet Ani Nersisyan, Quantum Hardware Engineering Manager on the Google Quantum AI team. Her team navigates a diverse set of problems ‚Äî from understan...
item.description:
Meet Ani Nersisyan, Quantum Hardware Engineering Manager on the Google Quantum AI team.

Her team navigates a diverse set of problems ‚Äî from understanding processor performance and underlying physics, to communicating with foundries on fabrication stack details. Learn more ‚Üì
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Whether we're shaping the future of sustainability or optimizing algorithms, Google Research has never been more driven to improve the lives of billio...
item.description: Whether we're shaping the future of sustainability or optimizing algorithms, Google Research has never been more driven to improve the lives of billions of people. Learn how our researchers are asking the big questions to create meaningful change ‚Üí https://goo.gle/47TvEGg
item.author: Google AI

item.title: We‚Äôre proud to highlight Google Research‚Äôs contributions to improving Clear Calling, the background noise reduction feature on Pixel, which can now ...
item.description: We‚Äôre proud to highlight Google Research‚Äôs contributions to improving Clear Calling, the background noise reduction feature on Pixel, which can now handle full-band audio & is powered by an audio-to-audio ML model that was optimized to run at low latency on Google Tensor.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Stop by the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth today at 4:15pm when Ryan Knuffman & Milica Cvetkovic will demostrate Multimodal RAG, a question answering syste...
item.description: Stop by the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth today at 4:15pm when Ryan Knuffman & Milica Cvetkovic will demostrate Multimodal RAG, a question answering system powered by Med-PaLM M and grounded in multimodal retrieval-augmented generation that is geared towards patient inquiries.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: At 4:15pm today @TheGradient will be at the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth to talk about the differences between Sharpness-Aware Minimization (that improve...
item.description: At 4:15pm today @TheGradient will be at the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth to talk about the differences between Sharpness-Aware Minimization (that improves generalization) and similar methods (that don't), which can be explained by the structure of the Hessian of the loss function.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Interested in learning more about Med-PaLM M, our generalist biomedical AI system? Drop by the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth at 3:15pm today where Tao Tu ...
item.description: Interested in learning more about Med-PaLM M, our generalist biomedical AI system? Drop by the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth at 3:15pm today where Tao Tu will give discuss Med-PaLM M and MultiMedBench, a new multimodal biomedical benchmark.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Adaptation methods (e.g., Adapter and LoRA) can finetune LMs with minimal parameter updates, but their inference remains expensive. At 3:15pm today dr...
item.description: Adaptation methods (e.g., Adapter and LoRA) can finetune LMs with minimal parameter updates, but their inference remains expensive. At 3:15pm today drop by our #NeurIPS2023 booth to learn about Conditional Adapters, which make LMs faster to use and apply across modalities!
item.author: Google AI

item.title: The Adversarial Nibbler Challenge is a prompt hacking competition for implicit adversarial prompts with the goal of improving generative text-to-image...
item.description: The Adversarial Nibbler Challenge is a prompt hacking competition for implicit adversarial prompts with the goal of improving generative text-to-image model safety one bite at a time. At 12:45pm today, visit the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth where @laroyo will talk all about it!
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Join us at the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth today at 12:45pm when Erin Drake Kajioka & Michal Todorovic will host a demo of resonator, an experimental ga...
item.description: Join us at the #NeurIPS2023 Google booth today at 12:45pm when Erin Drake Kajioka & Michal Todorovic will host a demo of resonator, an experimental game-based interface for exploring & discovering music through 3D visualizations of a music understanding model embedding.
item.author: Google AI
